name: Interstellar Express (dest1337)
description:
Manage an interstellar package delivery company, the more you play, the more chaotic it gets.

Made during  Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam.

I didn't have to time to polish it or to include a tutorial, so here's what you need to know:

Stations costs 150 coins to build (if you don't have enough coins the tetrahedron will shake indicating that you can't add a station), you'll restore 100 coins when you remove them, you can remove them only if they are not used (if a station is in use, the trash icon will shake indicating that you cannot remove the selected station).

The rest is explained in the help section, you can access it from main menu.

NB: This is a prototype, still full of bugs, it will be updated once the jam rating period is over.

Thanks for playing!
